name: Clouded
description: 5 minutes of memory. Find clues in the house, and write down anything you find on your arm. After 5 minutes, you'll fall unconscious, and wake up again outside the house. Only, the notes you find on your arm aren't what you remember writing.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
